synonyms.synonym: Low molecular weight cytosolic acid phosphatase

protein.specific_function: Acts on tyrosine phosphorylated proteins, low-MW aryl phosphates and natural and synthetic acyl phosphates. Isoform 3 does not possess phosphatase activity.

go_class.description: non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine phosphatase activity
hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine phosphatase activity

protein_properties.protein_sequence: >Low molecular weight phosphotyrosine protein phosphatase MAEQATKSVLFVCLGNICRSPIAEAVFRKLVTDQNISENWRVDSAATSGYEIGNPPDYRG QSCMKRHGIPMSHVARQITKEDFATFDYILCMDESNLRDLNRKSNQVKTCKAKIELLGSY DPQKQLIIEDPYYGNDSDFETVYQQCVRCCRAFLEKAH
